cause: Surface Finish issue on bearing casing
solution: 1. Notify OEM of the bearing failure and its cause to correct engine design and manufacturing specifications. 2. Get OEM remediation to all Fleet units affected by the issue. 3. Identify alternate make/model for future Fleet acquisitions or consider a new OEM supplier.
analysis: The analysis indicates that the failure of the landing is linked to a surface finish issue on the SS440 bearing casing which has been documented as a cause of connecting rod failures. The severity of the conditions, such as pulling 135% of max load and the uphill grade, exacerbates the issue.
